name: Miami Shuriken
description:
# Welcome to Miami Shuriken 

# Simple Arcade Retro game. 
The only thing you and to do is move to the sides and let the shuriken fall to kill the Slimes and Pick Up Power Ups.

# Buttons to Play

* Space BAR
* Arrows Keys
 
# Future Upgrades
- New Music Themes
- New Skins 
- New Power Ups

>! Caution the game can be addictive!
